column5: Some of you might remember in the UFC thread I mentioned about a new website called Veetle. Well it appears they have a 24 hour fishing channel as well!  Here is the link if anyone is interested.  http://www.veetle.com/v/4be6ed4762293   I am broadcasting myself now as well. Currently showing The Collector 2009.   Enjoy the fishing shows!  G.
Nothing but gibberish and hyroglypics on my screen
working just fine here.. did you install the software?  G
24hr fishing channel. I'm there. thanks. It works fine , needed to install veetle software.
its a great site Gerrit ive loaded a few movies from there ...iron man 2 and Avatar....so far so good and it seems to be safer then the torrents  it was a good find ....thanks
The broadcaster has taken the channel off air.  damn
